unit.name: Chaos Lord
unit.description: Equipment: Chaos Armour. Special Rules: none.

unit.name: Chaos Lord of Khorne
unit.description: Equipment: Chaos Armour. Special Rules: Mark of Khorne.

unit.name: Chaos Lord of Nurgle
unit.description: Equipment: Chaos Armour. Special Rules: Mark of Nurgle.

unit.name: Chaos Lord of Slaneesh
unit.description: Equipment: Chaos Armour. Special Rules: Mark of Slaanesh.

unit.name: Chaos Lord of Tzeentch
unit.description: Equipment: Chaos Armour. Special Rules: Mark of Tzeentch, Ward Save (6+).

unit.name: Exalted Chaos Sorcerer
unit.description: Magic: This model is a Level 4 wizard. Equipment: Chaos Armour. Special Rules: none.

unit.name: Exalted Chaos Sorcerer of Nurgle
unit.description: Magic: This model is a Level 4 wizard. Equipment: Chaos Armour. Special Rules: Mark of Nurgle.

unit.name: Exalted Chaos Sorcerer of Slaanesh
unit.description: Magic: This model is a Level 4 wizard. Equipment: Chaos Armour. Special Rules: Mark of Slaanesh.

unit.name: Exalted Chaos Sorcerer of Tzeentch
unit.description: Magic: This model is a Level 4 wizard. Equipment: Chaos Armour. Special Rules: Mark of Tzeentch, Ward Save (6+).

unit.name: Daemon Prince
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Terror, Daemonic.

unit.name: Daemon Prince of Khorne
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Terror, Eternal Hatred, MR (1), Daemonic.

unit.name: Daemon Prince of Nurgle
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Terror, Daemonic.

unit.name: Daemon Prince of Slaanesh
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Terror, ASF, Daemonic.

unit.name: Daemon Prince of Tzeentch
unit.description: Magic: This model is a Level 2 wizard. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Terror, Daemonic Ward Save (4+), Daemonic.

unit.name: Battle Standard
unit.description: Equipment: Chaos Armour. Special Rules: none.

unit.name: Battle Standard of Khorne
unit.description: Equipment: Chaos Armour. Special Rules: Mark of Khorne.

unit.name: Battle Standard of Nurgle
unit.description: Equipment: Chaos Armour. Special Rules: Mark of Nurgle.

unit.name: Battle Standard of Slaanesh
unit.description: Equipment: Chaos Armour. Special Rules: Mark of Slaanesh.

unit.name: Battle Standard of Tzeentch
unit.description: Equipment: Chaos Armour. Special Rules: Mark of Tzeentch, Ward Save (6+).

unit.name: Exalted Chaos Champion
unit.description: Equipment: Chaos Armour. Special Rules: none.

unit.name: Exalted Chaos Champion of Khorne
unit.description: Equipment: Chaos Armour. Special Rules: Mark of Khorne.

unit.name: Exalted Chaos Champion of Nurgle
unit.description: Equipment: Chaos Armour. Special Rules: Mark of Nurgle.

unit.name: Exalted Chaos Champion of Slaneesh
unit.description: Equipment: Chaos Armour. Special Rules: Mark of Slaanesh.

unit.name: Exalted Chaos Champion of Tzeentch
unit.description: Equipment: Chaos Armour. Special Rules: Mark of Tzeentch, Ward Save (6+).

unit.name: Chaos Sorcerer
unit.description: Magic: This model is a Level 2 wizard. Equipment: Chaos Armour. Special Rules: none.

unit.name: Chaos Sorcerer of Nurgle
unit.description: Magic: This model is a Level 2 wizard. Equipment: Chaos Armour. Special Rules: Mark of Nurgle.

unit.name: Chaos Sorcerer of Slaneesh
unit.description: Magic: This model is a Level 2 wizard. Equipment: Chaos Armour. Special Rules: Mark of Slaanesh.

unit.name: Chaos Sorcerer of Tzeentch
unit.description: Magic: This model is a Level 2 wizard. Equipment: Chaos Armour. Special Rules: Mark of Tzeentch, Ward Save (6+).

unit.name: Marauder
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon, light armour and flails. Special Rules: Block (shield).

unit.name: Chaos Warrior
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and Chaos Armour. Special Rules: Block (shield).

unit.name: Chaos Knight
unit.description: Mount: Barded Chaos Steed. Equipment: Lances, Chaos Armour and shield. Special Rules: Heavy Cavalry.

unit.name: Chaos Warhound
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Expendable.

unit.name: Marauder Horseman
unit.description: Mount: Warhorse. Equipment: Light armour (or shield). Special Rules: Light Cavalry.

unit.name: Forsaken
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and heavy armour. Special Rules: Frenzy, Light Infantry.

unit.name: Harpy
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Flying Skirmishers, Beasts.

unit.name: Chosen
unit.description: Equipment: Ensorcelled Weapon, Chaos Armour and shield (independent of what their actual equipment looks like). Special Rules: Stubborn, Martial Honour.

unit.name: Chaos Chariot
unit.description: Chariot: 3+AS, 2 Chaos Warrior Crew, 2 Barded Chaos Steeds. Equipment: One Chaos Warrior is armed with a halberd, the other one with a hand weapon. Special Rules: Impact Hits (D3+2).

unit.name: Gorebeast Chariot
unit.description: Chariot: 3+AS, 2 Chaos Warrior Crew, 1 Gorbeast. Equipment: One Chaos Warrior is armed with a halberd, the other one with a hand weapon. Special Rules: Impact Hits (D3+2), Fear, Killing Blow (Gorebeast only).

unit.name: Chaos Troll
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Fear, Stupidity, Regeneration (4+), Troll Vomit.

unit.name: Chaos Ogre
unit.description: Equipment: Hand Weapon and light armour. Special Rules: Fear, Block (Shield).

unit.name: Dragon Ogre
unit.description: Equipment: Hand Weapon. Special Rules: Fear, Scaly Skin (5+).

unit.name: Chaos Warshrine
unit.description: Equipment: Hand Weapon. Special Rules: Fear, Large Target, Immune to Psychology, Ward Save (4+), Warshrine, Stubborn.

unit.name: Skullcrushers of Khorne
unit.description: Mount: Juggernaut. Equipment: Lances, Chaos Armour and shield. Special Rules: Heavy Cavalry, Fear, MR (1), Scaly Skin (6+), Frenzy (Skullcrusher only), Killing Blow (Juggernaut only), Magical Attacks (Juggernaut only).

unit.name: Putrid Blightking
unit.description: Equipment: Chaos Armour, shield and an array of weaponry. Special Rules: Immune to Psychology, Mark of Nurgle.

unit.name: Hellstrider of Slaanesh
unit.description: Mount: Steed of Slaanesh. Equipment: Spear, light armour and shield. Special Rules: Fear, Mark of Slaanesh, Poisoned Attacks (1) (Steed of Slaanesh only), Magical Attacks (Steed of Slaanesh only).

unit.name: Chaos Giant
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Terror, Stubborn, Immune to Panic, Large Target, Giant.

unit.name: Chaos Spawn
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Fear, Unbreakable, Chaos Spawn.

unit.name: Dragon Ogre Shaggoth
unit.description: Equipment: Hand Weapon and light armour. Special Rules: Terror, Large Target, Immune to Psychology, Scaly Skin (4+).

unit.name: Slaughterbrute
unit.description: Equipment: Hand Weapon. Special Rules: Terror, Large Target, Stubborn, Deamonic Ward Save (5+), Frenzy, MR (1), Rune of Binding.

unit.name: Mutalith Vortex Beast
unit.description: Equipment: Hand Weapon. Special Rules: Terror, Large Target, Immune to Psychology, Deamonic Ward Save (5+), Mutalith Vortex Beast.

unit.name: Chimera
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Flying Model, Terror, Large Target, March Blocker, Fiery Breath.

unit.name: Hellcannon
unit.description: Hellcannon Warmachine: 1 Helldaemon and 3 Chaos Dwarfs. Equipment: Hand weapon. The Chaos Dwarfs wear heavy armour. Special Rules: Terror, Large Target, Immune to Psychology, Hellcannon.

mount.name: Chaos Steed
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: none.

mount.name: Daemonic Mount
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Daemonic Mount.

mount.name: Juggernaut of Khorne
mount.description: Equipment: Chaos Armour and hand weapon. Special Rules: Daemonic Mount, Killing Blow.

mount.name: Palanquin of Nurgle
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Palanquin of Nurgle, Magical Attacks.

mount.name: Beast of Slaanesh
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Daemonic Mount, Poisoned Attacks (1).

mount.name: Disc of Tzeentch
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Flying Model (15"), Daemonic Mount, Disc of Tzeentch.

mount.name: Manticore
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Flying Model, Large Target, Terror, Killing Blow, Uncontrollable.

mount.name: Chaos Dragon
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Flying Model, Large Target, Terror, Scaly Skin (3+), Chaos Dragon.

mount.name: Barded Chaos Steed
mount.description: Equipment: Barding, Hand weapon. Special Rules: none.

mount.name: Chaos Chariot
mount.description: Chariot: 3+AS, 2 Chaos Warrior Crew, 2 Barded Chaos Steeds. Equipment: One Chaos Warrior is armed with a halberd, the other one with a hand weapon. Special Rules: Impact Hits (D3+2)

mount.name: Chaos Chariot (Mark of Khorne)
mount.description: Chariot: 3+AS, 2 Chaos Warrior Crew, 2 Barded Chaos Steeds. Equipment: One Chaos Warrior is armed with a halberd, the other one with a hand weapon. Special Rules: Impact Hits (D3+2)

mount.name: Chaos Chariot (Mark of Nurgle)
mount.description: Chariot: 3+AS, 2 Chaos Warrior Crew, 2 Barded Chaos Steeds. Equipment: One Chaos Warrior is armed with a halberd, the other one with a hand weapon. Special Rules: Impact Hits (D3+2)

mount.name: Chaos Chariot (Mark of Slaanesh)
mount.description: Chariot: 3+AS, 2 Chaos Warrior Crew, 2 Barded Chaos Steeds. Equipment: One Chaos Warrior is armed with a halberd, the other one with a hand weapon. Special Rules: Impact Hits (D3+2)

mount.name: Chaos Chariot (Mark of Tzeentch)
mount.description: Chariot: 3+AS, 2 Chaos Warrior Crew, 2 Barded Chaos Steeds. Equipment: One Chaos Warrior is armed with a halberd, the other one with a hand weapon. Special Rules: Impact Hits (D3+2)

mount.name: Gorebeast Chariot
mount.description: Chariot: 3+AS, 2 Chaos Warrior Crew, 1 Gorbeast. Equipment: One Chaos Warrior is armed with a halberd, the other one with a hand weapon. Special Rules: Impact Hits (D3+2), Fear, Killing Blow (Gorebeast only).

mount.name: Gorebeast Chariot (Mark of Khorne)
mount.description: Chariot: 3+AS, 2 Chaos Warrior Crew, 1 Gorbeast. Equipment: One Chaos Warrior is armed with a halberd, the other one with a hand weapon. Special Rules: Impact Hits (D3+2), Fear, Killing Blow (Gorebeast only).

mount.name: Gorebeast Chariot (Mark of Nurgle)
mount.description: Chariot: 3+AS, 2 Chaos Warrior Crew, 1 Gorbeast. Equipment: One Chaos Warrior is armed with a halberd, the other one with a hand weapon. Special Rules: Impact Hits (D3+2), Fear, Killing Blow (Gorebeast only).

mount.name: Gorebeast Chariot (Mark of Slaanesh)
mount.description: Chariot: 3+AS, 2 Chaos Warrior Crew, 1 Gorbeast. Equipment: One Chaos Warrior is armed with a halberd, the other one with a hand weapon. Special Rules: Impact Hits (D3+2), Fear, Killing Blow (Gorebeast only).

mount.name: Gorebeast Chariot (Mark of Tzeentch)
mount.description: Chariot: 3+AS, 2 Chaos Warrior Crew, 1 Gorbeast. Equipment: One Chaos Warrior is armed with a halberd, the other one with a hand weapon. Special Rules: Impact Hits (D3+2), Fear, Killing Blow (Gorebeast only).

item.name: 2nd Sign of Amul PM 2/6+
2nd Sign of Amul PM 3/6+
item.description: The player gets D3 rerolls. Each reroll can be used to reroll one to-hit roll, to-wound roll, armour save, ward save or regeneration roll. Any rerolls not used at the end of the players turn are wasted.

item.name: Affiliation
item.description: Some Chaos units are devoted to one of the 4 Chaos deities (Khorne, Nurgle, Slaanesh and Tzeentch). The affiliation of a unit is determined either by its mark (e.g. Mark of Tzeentch) or name (e.g. Hellstriders of Slaanesh, Bloodletters of Khorne. Nurglings are affiliated with Nurgle.). All other units are considered to have no affiliation. Characters may only join units with the same affiliation as themselves or no affiliation, except for character models with no affiliation which are not restricted and free to join units independent of their affiliation.

item.name: Allure of Slaanesh
item.description: units in btb with one or more models with this gift suffer -1Ld

item.name: Amulet of Chaos
item.description: Ward Save (5+)

item.name: Armour of Damnation
item.description: Chaos Armour. Models that like to attack the bearer in cc have to re-roll successful to-hit rolls.

item.name: Armour of Khorne
item.description: 4+AS that cannot be improved further, in addition magical weapons of models in btb contact lose their special abilities (i.e. count as common weapons of their kind) as long as they stay in btb contact with this model.

item.name: Armour of Tortured Souls
item.description: Chaos Armour, +1T vs non-magical attacks

item.name: Avatar
item.description: This model never suffers a Warp Collapse, instead it loses a number of wound equal to the amount it failed the break test by.

item.name: Axe of Khorne
item.description: Bearer gains +D3 A instead of +1A for Frenzy, Killing Blow (Khorne only)

item.name: Axes of Khorgor
item.description: Counts as additional hand weapons. The model rerolls failed to-hit rolls.

item.name: BM Blissful Throes
item.description: (8+) MM, Range 12", D6 S6 hits

item.name: BM Blue Fire of Metamorph.
item.description: (9+) MM, Range 24", 2D6 S(2+D3) hits

item.name: BM Dark Hand of Death
item.description: (5+) MM, Range 24", D6 S4 hits

item.name: BM Delectable Torture
item.description: (7+) Hex, Range 24". Target character model (but not his mount) attacks the unit he is in, models are hit automatically and hits are allocated like shooting. Wounds inflicted do not count for combat resolution but may result in a panic test.

item.name: BM Delicious Excruciation
item.description: (8+) Augment, Range 12", unit is Stubborn until the casters next magic phase

item.name: BM Doom and Darkness
item.description: (9+) Hex, Range 24", target unit suffers a -3 modifier on all Ld based tests until casters next magic phase.

item.name: BM Effulgent Boils
item.description: (8+) MM, Range 24", D6 S4 hits, no AS

item.name: BM Enrapturing Spasms
item.description: (10+) Hex, Range 18". Choose effect A), B) or C): - A) In its next movment phase, target unit cannot charge and may only reform but not move otherwise. - B) In its next magic phase, target unit cannot cast spells. - C) In its next shooting phase, target unit cannot use ranged attacks.

item.name: BM Favoured Poxes
item.description: (7+) Hex, Range 18", target unit suffers -1WS, BS, S and Ld (to min. of 1) until the casters next magic phase

item.name: BM Glistening Scabs
item.description: (8+) Hex, Range 18". Target character model within LOS suffers -1T (to min. of 1) until the end of the game.

item.name: BM Glorious Affliction
item.description: (8+) Hex, Range 24". Target unit halves its M (rounding up) including mounts. Flyers have to use their ground movement but do not half their M. Lasts until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: BM Green Fire of Mutation
item.description: (9+) DD, Range 24". Target unit attacks itself. Each model makes a single attack (weapon option of Chaos players choice) and hits are allocated like shooting. Has no effect on mounts and character models. The Block special rule has no effect against damage suffered from this spell.

item.name: BM Hand of Dust
item.description: (5+) One enemy unit in btb with the caster suffers D6 S4 hits

item.name: BM Hellshriek
item.description: (8+) Hex, Range 18", needs LOS. Target unit has to take a panic test. Has no effect on units that are Immune to Psychology.

item.name: BM Luxurious Torment
item.description: (8+) Augment or Hex, Range 24", target unit gets Frenzy and suffers D6 S3 hits at the end of each magic phase (both players). If the target unit is affiliated to Slaanesh, it gains Frenzy. If the target unit is not affiliated to Slaanesh, it suffers from Stupidity. Lasts until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: BM Magnificent Buboes
item.description: (7+) Range 24", single enemy model within LOS suffers a S4 hit with no AS

item.name: BM Pandemonium
item.description: (8+) RIP, enemy units gain no benefit from Inspiring Presence and Hold Your Ground!

item.name: BM Pestilence
item.description: (11+) Hex, Range 24", RIP, When the spell is successfully cast as well as at the start of each players magic phase the target suffers D6 S3 no AS hits.

item.name: BM Red Fire of Alteration
item.description: (5+) MM, Range 30", D6 S(D6) hits

item.name: BM Shades of Death
item.description: (6+) Augment, Range 18", unit causes Fear. If it already causes Fear, unit causes Terror instead. Lasts until casters next magic phase

item.name: BM Violet Fire of Tzeentch
item.description: (7+) DD, Range 24", target has to take a Ld-Test. If it fails, it suffers a wound with no AS for each point it failed the test. Wounds are allocated like shooting.

item.name: BM Wind of Death
item.description: (9+) MM, Range 24", 2D6 S4 hits

item.name: BM Word of Pain
item.description: (9+) Hex, Range 24", target units WS and BS is reduced to 1 until casters next magic phase.

item.name: BM Yellow Fire of Transfor.
item.description: (4+) Augment, caster, his mount and unit (including other character models) get a Ward Save (5+) until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Bane Shield
item.description: Shield, for every successful armour save the attacker suffers a S4 hit

item.name: Banner of Rage
Banner of Rage (Khorne only)
item.description: Bearer and unit reroll failed break tests and never lose Frenzy (regain Frenzy if already lost). (Khorne only)

item.name: Banner of Wrath
item.description: PM2/5+, Dark Hand of Death spell, MM, Range 24", D6 S4 hits

item.name: Banner of the Gods
item.description: Bearer and unit cause Terror.

item.name: Battle Axe of Khorne
item.description: Killing Blow, in addition each to-wound roll of a natural 6 causes D3 wounds (after saves)

item.name: Beacon of Chaos
item.description: If this model is the general of the army, its range for Inspiring Presence is 18".

item.name: Beastmaster
item.description: The Beastmaster does NOT replace a Warhound and counts as the unit Champion.

item.name: Beasts
item.description: The unit has to use its own Ld value for all Ld-Test.

item.name: Berserker Sword
item.description: +1A for each enemy model in BTB. Models on foot only.

item.name: Bestial Visage
item.description: Model causes Fear

item.name: Bindings of Slaanesh
item.description: Challenges issued by the bearer may not be refused and the Chaos player may choose which model has to accept the challenge (even if it is not in first rank). During the first combat phase of a challenge where the bearer used the Bindings of Slaanesh, the bearer suffers from ASL (even if he has ASF). (Slaanesh only)

item.name: Blade of the Ether
item.description: cc attacks ignore AS

item.name: Blasphemous Amulet
item.description: At the start of the Chaos players magic phase, enemy models in btb with the bearer must pass a S test or suffer a wound with no AS.

item.name: Blasted Sta. (Tzeentch only)
item.description: Blasted Standard

item.name: Blasted Standard
Blasted Stan. (Tzeentch only)
Blasted St. (Tzeentch only)
item.description: Ward Save (5+) vs shooting and magic missile attacks. (Tzeentch only)

item.name: Bloodhunt Horn
item.description: A fleeing enemy unit within 12" will automatically fail its rally test. Declare the use of this item before the test is taken. One use only.

item.name: Book of Secrets
item.description: PM2/5+, Dark Hand of Death spell, every time the casting roll for this spell fails, the bearer suffers a S6 hit

item.name: Bountiful Blades
item.description: This unit is equipped with an array of weaponry. At the start of each combat it has to choose one of the following weapon options: great weapon, additional hand weapon or hand weapon and shield.

item.name: Champion of Khorne
item.description: Model rerolls to-hit rolls of natural 1s in challenges.

item.name: Chaos Armour
item.description: 4+ AS

item.name: Chaos Daemon Sword
item.description: When the bearer decides to use this weapon, said weapon grant its bearer S7 and A7 in cc but the model can no longer switch to a different weapon, i.e. it has to use the weapon until the end of the game. For each 1 on the to-hit roll the bearer suffers a S7 hit. The bearer of this sword may not re-roll to-hit rolls of 1 if he uses this weapon.

item.name: Chaos Disruption
item.description: Units shooting at this model suffer -1BS (to a minimum of 0) for this attack.

item.name: Chaos Dragon
item.description: The Chaos Dragon has two breath weapons that may both be used each turn but have to target the same unit. The templates may be placed at either or both mouths of the dragon. - Dragon Fire: Breath weapon, S4 - Poisonous Breath: Breath weapon, S2, AP(3)

item.name: Chaos Runeshield
item.description: Shield. Negates the effects of magical weapons in btb contact. Treat them as common (i.e. non-magical) weapons of their type.

item.name: Chaos Spawn
item.description: Random Movement (2) with the following exceptions: The model has an AOS of 360deg, i.e. it can move in all directions.

item.name: Clairvoyance PM 2/3+
Clairvoyance PM 3/3+
item.description: Target one unit on the board. Your opponent has to reveal any hidden models and magic items (but not which model has them) in that unit.

item.name: Cloud of Flies
item.description: -1 to-hit in cc

item.name: Cloven Hoofs
item.description: Model gains M7. Models on foot only.

item.name: Collar of Khorne
item.description: MR2 (Khorne only)

item.name: Corona
item.description: At the start of each players magic phase, all enemy models in btb contact suffer a S3 hit.

item.name: Crimson Armour of Dargan
item.description: Chaos Armour. Models that like to attack the bearer must pass a Ld-test or may not attack at all this combat phase.

item.name: Crown of Everl. Conquest
item.description: Regeneration (4+)

item.name: Daemonic
item.description: - Cause Fear - Daemonic Ward Save (5+) - Immune to Psychology - Magical attacks - Instability: When a daemonic unit loses combat it has to take a break test with the following exceptions: - Flux Disruption: If the unit fails to pass its break test and the roll is equal to or less than the leadership of the unit, it suffers a number of wounds equal to the amount it failed the test by (no saves of any kind allowed). - Warp Collapse: If the unit fails to pass its break test and the roll is higher than the leadership of the unit, it is destroyed Notes: - Ld-bonuses from characters and the Gold Your Ground! special rule can be used as normal. - Should a unit also benefit from Stubborn, it then does not suffer wounds because of Flux Disruption.

item.name: Daemonic Mount
item.description: - The model causes Fear - The mount has Daemonic Ward Save (5+) - The mount has Magical attacks - After the rider is slain the model is subject to the Daemonic special rules (see above)

item.name: Daemonic Robes
item.description: Model may never be wounded on better than 3+.

item.name: Dark Fury PM 2/5+
Dark Fury PM 3/5+
item.description: Augment, Range 18", unit rerolls to-wound rolls of natural 1s until the casters next magic phase

item.name: Deaths Head
item.description: Throwing weapon with 12" range that always hits on a 2+. Target unit suffer D6 S3 hits with no AS. Units that suffer at least one casualty must take a panic test. One use only. (Nurgle only)

item.name: Diabolic Splendour
item.description: The Daemonic Ward Save turns into a normal Ward Save.

item.name: Disc of Tzeentch
item.description: The model counts as a Large Target for LOS purposes.

item.name: Disciple of Khorne
item.description: The model may attempt to dispel spells as if it was a wizard.

item.name: Dispel Scroll
item.description: Automatically dispels one spell without the need of DD. One use only.

item.name: Domination
item.description: At the start of each cc phase one model in btb (Chaos players choice) has to take a Ld test. If failed, that model may not attack and all attacks against this model hit automatically that turn. (If used on a rank and file model, attacks need to be allocated. There is no overkill!). Has no effect on models that are immune to psychology.

item.name: Enchanted Shield
item.description: Shield that grants +2 AS

item.name: Ensorcelled Weapon
Ensorcelled Weapons
item.description: hand weapon that grants +1S and magical attacks

item.name: Ethersword
item.description: no AS

item.name: Expendable
item.description: This unit does not cause panic in friendly units, unless they are Expendable themselves.

item.name: Eye of the Gods PM 2/5+
Eye of the Gods PM 3/5+
item.description: Augment, Range 12", If the spell was cast successfully roll a D6 and consult the table below. The effect lasts until the casters next magic phase. A unit may only ever benefit of one Eye of the Gods effect at the same time, i.e. a second (or further) effect replaces the currently active effect. If the target consists of a unit with joined character models, only roll once and apply the result to all elements. If any element has the Favour of the Gods special rule then the roll may be modified by 1 once (i.e. independent of the actual number of Favours in the unit). 1: Immune to Psychology 2: Cause Fear (cause Terror if already cause fear) 3: AP (1) (cc and missile weapons) 4: unit rerolls 1s to hit (cc and missile weapons) 5: Poisoned Attacks (1) (cc and missile weapons) 6: +1 Toughness

item.name: Favour of the Gods
item.description: When the model is affected by the Eye of the Gods spell, it may modify its roll by 1.

item.name: Filth Mace
item.description: Poisoned Attacks (1). If the bearer kills a model in cc with this weapon, it causes Terror for the rest of the game. (Nurgle only)

item.name: Flail of Decay
item.description: no AS, in addition each to-wound roll of 6 causes 2 wounds (after saves)

item.name: Flesh Banner
item.description: At the end of each of your magic phases, a single enemy unit (of your choice) in btb with the bearer suffers D6 S4 hits allocated like shooting.

item.name: Gaze of Acquiescence
item.description: One model of the Daemon players choice in btb with the model takes a Ld test at the start of each cc phase. If failed victim may not attack that turn. Has no effect on models that are Immune to Psychology.

item.name: Gaze of the Gods
item.description: Ward Save (4+). If the model is fleeing at the start of the Chaos players magic phase then the model is destroyed and removed from play.

item.name: Giant
item.description: see chapter Giants in core rules

item.name: Golden Eye of Tzeentch
item.description: Ward Save (4+) vs shooting and magic missile attacks for bearer and mount. (Tzeentch only)

item.name: Gore Banner
item.description: Unit rerolls failed panic tests.

item.name: Hellfire Sword
item.description: All hits automatically wound. (AS is modified by the bearers S)

item.name: Hellscourge
Hellscourges
item.description: hand weapon that grants its bearer ASF

item.name: Helm of Many Eyes
item.description: Bearer gains ASF but also suffers from Stupidity

item.name: Horns
item.description: Model gains Impact Hits (1). Models on foot only.

item.name: Mark of Khorne
item.description: MR1, Frenzy (does not affect mounts). Character models with this mark may take a Ld test at the start of their turn. Each character model that passes does not have to charge this turn due to its own Frenzy but may still be forced to if attached to a unit with Frenzy.

item.name: Mark of Nurgle
item.description: Fear, units shooting at this unit suffer -1BS (to a minimum of 0) for this attack

item.name: Mark of Slaanesh
item.description: Immune to Fear, Terror and Panic

item.name: Mark of Tzeentch
item.description: reroll failed Ward Saves of 1, Ward Save (6+) if model has no Ward Save

item.name: Mirror of Knowledge
item.description: PM2/3+, Clairvoyance spell (Tzeentch only)

item.name: Mutalith Vortex Beast
item.description: This model may cast the following spell: - Vortex of Change (PM 3/5+): Direct Damage, Range 18". Place the center of the 3" template within 18" then scatter the template D6" (the hit symbol means that the template does not scatter). For each hit (see Templates in core rules) the unit suffers a S4 hit with no AS, allocated like shooting. - This spell cannot be lost through a miscast.

item.name: Noxious Vapours
item.description: Models in btb contact suffer from ASL

item.name: Nurgles Blessing PM 2/6+
Nurgles Blessing PM 3/6+
item.description: Augment, Range 18", unit gets +1T until the casters next magic phase. Has no effect on character models.

item.name: Nurgles Chosen
item.description: Regeneration (5+)

item.name: Nurgles Rot
item.description: At the start of each players magic phase, all enemy models in btb contact have to roll a D6: on a roll of a6 they suffer a wound with no AS.

item.name: Nurgling Infestation
item.description: Any model that attacks this model in cc suffers a single S3 hit.

item.name: Obsidian Armour
item.description: 3+AS that cannot be improved further

item.name: Palanquin of Nurgle
item.description: The Palanquin is a common mount, i.e. it cannot be attacked, it grants a 6+AS to its rider, etc. In addition the model still counts as an infantry model with US 1 and there-fore cannot be singled out by shooting (under normal circumstances). Also when this model joins a unit, then the unit counts their rank bonus as if the space the Palanquin takes up was filled with rank and file models.

item.name: Paralysis
item.description: ASF

item.name: Pendant of Slaanesh
item.description: For each wound the bearer loses, he gains +1A until the end of the game. (Slaanesh only)

item.name: Plague Banner
Plague Banner (Nurgle only)
item.description: At the end of each of your magic phases all enemy models in btb with the bearer suffer a S3 hit with no AS. (Nurgle only)

item.name: Plague Flail
item.description: Poisoned Attacks (2)

item.name: Power Familiar
item.description: +1 PD every magic phase which may only be used by the bearer.

item.name: Power Stone
item.description: +2 PD to cast a spell. Dice used may exceed maximum allowed by level. One use only.

item.name: Power Vortex
item.description: During the Daemon players magic phase the model may give up wounds (no saves of any kind allowed) to generate D3 PD per wound which can only be used by this model.

item.name: Presence of Khorne
item.description: Friendly units with Frenzy within 6" of this model may take a Ld test at the start of their turn. Each unit that passes does not have to charge this turn. If this model is attached to the unit, make a single Ld test for this model and its unit.

item.name: Rapturous Standard
Rapturous St. (Slaanesh only)
item.description: Models in btb with the bearer and his unit halve WS and I (rounding up). (Slaanesh only)

item.name: Rending Sword
item.description: causes D3 wounds

item.name: Rod of Corruption
item.description: PM 2/5+, Direct Damage, Range 18", place the center of the 3" template within 18", for each hit (see Templates in core rules) the unit suffers a S3 hit with no AS, allocated like shooting. A unit that suffers at least one casualty has to take a panic test. One use only. (Nurgle only)

item.name: Rune of Binding
item.description: If the army is led by a general from the Warriors of Chaos list, this model gains the following benefits when it is within 12" of the army general: - It may use the WS of the general - It may take a Ld-Test at the start of the turn. If passed, the model does not have to attack due to Frenzy this turn.

item.name: Sceptre of Domination
item.description: PM 2/7+, Delectable Torture spell (Slaanesh only)

item.name: Scimitar of Skultar
item.description: Killing Blow

item.name: Seeping Pus PM 2/5+
Seeping Pus PM 3/5+
item.description: Augment, Range 18", unit gets Poisoned Attacks (1) (cc as well as shooting), until the casters next magic phase. If the unit already has Poisoned Attacks, increase its value by +1. Has no effect on magic items.

item.name: Shroud of Darkness PM 2/5+
Shroud of Darkness PM 3/5+
Shroud of Darkness PM 2/6+
Shroud of Darkness PM 3/6+
item.description: (5+), Augment, Range 18", 5+ Ward Save vs ranged attacks and spells until the casters next magic phase. Has no effect on character models.

item.name: Skull of Katam
item.description: +1 to cast spells (PM/BM)

item.name: Slaaneshs Blessing PM 2/8+
Slaaneshs Blessing PM 3/8+
item.description: Augment, Range 18", unit gets ASF until the casters next magic phase

item.name: Slime Trail
item.description: Enemies fighting this model in cc do not gain bonuses for fighting in its flank or rear.

item.name: Soporific Musk
item.description: Enemy units in btb contact with this unit roll one additional dice when they flee and discard the highest.

item.name: Soul Cleaver
item.description: Models wounded (after saves) must pass a T-test or suffer 1 additional wound (no saves of any kind allowed)

item.name: Soul Hunger
item.description: Model rerolls failed to-wound rolls.

item.name: Soulthirster
item.description: Roll a die for each model killed: regain 1W for each 6 rolled (up to starting wounds). Immediately roll when a model is killed and apply the result.

item.name: Spell Destroyer
item.description: Dispel Scroll. On a 4+ BM / 5+ PM the spell is destroyed. One use only.

item.name: Spell Familiar
Master of Sorcery
item.description: Bearer may use one more PD to cast spells than his level allows (BM only).

item.name: Spelleater Shield
item.description: Shield, MR2. Any spell that targets the bearer (or his unit) that is dispelled is destroyed on a D6 roll of a 4+. In addition the model may attempt to dispel spells that target itself (or his unit) as if it was a wizard. (Khorne only)

item.name: Staff of Change
item.description: Once per magic phase the model may reroll a single dice when casting a spell (BM and PM). Can prevent miscasts and cause irresistible force. (Tzeentch only)

item.name: Staff of Nurgle
item.description: PM 2/8+, Effulgent Boils spell

item.name: Staff of Sorcery
item.description: +1 to total roll to attempt to dispel a spell.

item.name: Steed of Shadows PM 2/4+
Steed of Shadows PM 3/4+
item.description: Augment, cast on itself or friendly character model on foot with US1 (in both cases) within 12", model may immediately make a 20" fly movement. This move can be used to leave cc but cannot be used to enter combat (i.e. charging is not possible).

item.name: Stream of Bile
item.description: Breath weapon, S4

item.name: Stream of Corruption
Fiery Breath
item.description: Breath weapon, S3

item.name: Sword of Change
item.description: Every time a character model or a monster is slain by this sword, roll a D6. On a 4+ a Chaos Spawn with D3 wounds comes into play under the control of the Chaos player. The Chaos Spawn model has to be placed within 6" of the bearer of this sword and no closer than 1" to enemy units. If the model cannot be placed it counts as destroyed. Chaos Spawns generated by this sword are worth no VP. (Tzeentch only)

item.name: Tentacles
item.description: Model in btb loses 1A, Chaos player may choose which model and which attack

item.name: The Black Tongue
item.description: The bearer takes a wound (no saves of any kind allowed) to convert an enemies failed casting into a miscast (PM and BM).

item.name: Tormentor
item.description: One model of the Daemon players choice in btb with the model takes a Ld test at the start of each cc phase. If failed victim has to attack his own unit or any model in btb contact (Daemon players choice). Wounds inflicted count for combat resolution. Has no effect on models that are Immune to Psychology. If there are no legal targets, the model does not attack at all.

item.name: Troll Vomit
item.description: Instead of attacking normally, the unit may decide to use their special vomit attack: each model causes 1 S5 hit with no AS to one enemy model it is in btb with.

item.name: Trollhide
item.description: Regeneration (6+)

item.name: Twin Heads
item.description: +2 to cast spells (PM/BM)

item.name: Twisted Reality
item.description: Spell Ranges increased by 6", has no effect on spells without range

item.name: Tzeentchs Blessing
item.description: Model ignores all miscast effects (i.e. the casting still fails but do not roll on the miscast table).

item.name: Tzeentchs Chosen
item.description: Model may reroll a single dice per game. (to-hit, towound, saving throw, characteristic test (inlc. Ld), casting and dispelling).

item.name: Tzeentchs Will
item.description: Model may reroll a single dice per turn. (to-hit, towound, saving throw, characteristic test (inlc. Ld), casting and dispelling).

item.name: Uncontrollable
item.description: At the start of each turn that the model is not already in close combat, it has to pass as Ld-Test. If the test is failed the model suffers from Frenzy until it passes its Uncontrollable test or loses combat. Note that it is possible for the model to regain Frenzy even if it lost it in cc before.

item.name: Upgrade Level 2 wizard
item.description: Model becomes a Level 2 wizard.

item.name: War Banner
item.description: +1CR

item.name: Warrior Familiar
item.description: At the start of each cc round (Timing step 1) the Warrior Familiar inflicts one S5 hit against an enemy model in btb with the bearer.

item.name: Warshrine
item.description: - This model may cast the Eye of the Gods (PM 3/5+) spell. In addition, roll two dice instead of one and choose which one result to apply. If you roll a double, you may pick any result. - This spell cannot be lost through a miscast.

item.name: Whip of Pleasure
item.description: Counts as additional hand weapons and grants ASF (Slaanesh only)

item.name: Will of Chaos
item.description: If the army is led by a general from the Warriors of Chaos list, all Warriors of Chaos units reroll failed panic tests. If the army general is a Daemon Prince, then its warband determines which list it was chosen from and only the respective special rule applies for the army.

item.name: Winged Horror
item.description: The model can fly and counts as a Flying Model.

item.name: Wrath of Slaanesh PM 2/5+
Wrath of Slaanesh PM 3/5+
item.description: Augment, Range 18", unit gets AP(1) (cc as well as shooting), until the casters next magic phase. Has no effect on magic items.
